docs.text: Pika Booking A simple, cozy booking system for the browser made in Python 🐍 For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.text: ER Diagram This shows a ER Diagram which explains the backend of this booking app. The Diagram is created using mermaid. Professors/Instructors: Refer to the folder named Instructors at the docs folder where a pdf version of this diagram can be found erDiagram Person }|..|{ Ticket : has Person }|--o{ Staff : "whose role is" Person ||--o{ Student : "whose role is" Person ||--o{ Professor : "whose role is" Person ||--o{ Ticket : has Ticket ||--o{ Reservation : Booking Reservation ||--o{ Room : Reserves Room ||--o{ Building : "This room is located at" Room ||--o{ Room_Type : "This room is" Person { id p_id string p_fname string p_lname string p_age string p_phone } Ticket { id t_id int t_number dateFormat t_date } Staff { id st_id string st_role string st_dept } Professor { id pr_id string p_degree string p_rank string p_email } Room { id r_id int r_capacity dateFormat end_datetime dateFormat start_datetime boolean r_use } Building { id b_id string b_name string b_location string b_name string b_dept } Reservation { dateFormat check_out dateFormat check_in } Room_Type { id rt_id string type } Student { id s_id string s_email float s_gpa string s_num string s_mayor }
docs.title: ER Diagram

docs.text: This shows a ER Diagram which explains the backend of this booking app. The Diagram is created using mermaid. Professors/Instructors: Refer to the folder named Instructors at the docs folder where a pdf version of this diagram can be found erDiagram Person }|..|{ Ticket : has Person }|--o{ Staff : "whose role is" Person ||--o{ Student : "whose role is" Person ||--o{ Professor : "whose role is" Person ||--o{ Ticket : has Ticket ||--o{ Reservation : Booking Reservation ||--o{ Room : Reserves Room ||--o{ Building : "This room is located at" Room ||--o{ Room_Type : "This room is" Person { id p_id string p_fname string p_lname string p_age string p_phone } Ticket { id t_id int t_number dateFormat t_date } Staff { id st_id string st_role string st_dept } Professor { id pr_id string p_degree string p_rank string p_email } Room { id r_id int r_capacity dateFormat end_datetime dateFormat start_datetime boolean r_use } Building { id b_id string b_name string b_location string b_name string b_dept } Reservation { dateFormat check_out dateFormat check_in } Room_Type { id rt_id string type } Student { id s_id string s_email float s_gpa string s_num string s_mayor }
